nodes.title: Home
nodes.headline: IntelliCloud: Where Cloud, AI and Marketing Become Revenue
nodes.description: IntelliCloud merges cloud engineering, Salesforce, AI and modern marketing into one integrated growth system so you can scale operations, elevate customer experience and grow revenue with less chaos.

nodes.title: Cloud & Technology
nodes.headline: Cloud & Technology — The Digital Foundation Your Revenue Deserves
nodes.description: We design, build and integrate the platforms your business runs on: Google Cloud, AWS, Salesforce, modern web apps, APIs and AI infrastructure, all engineered to support real-world growth.

children.title: Cloud Engineering
children.headline: Modern Cloud Architecture for Real-World Performance
children.description: We architect high-availability environments on Google Cloud and AWS with serverless apps, DevOps workflows, CI/CD and security baked in, ready for AI workloads and data-intensive applications.

children.title: Web Application Development
children.headline: Web Apps and Portals Built Like Products
children.description: We build fast, secure and scalable web applications with Nuxt, Vue and TypeScript, from customer portals to internal tools and dashboards that your teams actually enjoy using.

children.title: Cloud-Native Business Applications
children.headline: Cloud-Native Business Applications Tailored to Your Processes
children.description: We design and deliver custom quote tools, onboarding portals and multi-tenant SaaS foundations that run natively on modern cloud infrastructure.

children.title: Salesforce Engineering & CRM Development
children.headline: Salesforce, Supercharged for Revenue Teams
children.description: We transform Salesforce into a true revenue platform with Apex, Lightning Web Components, Aura and Flows that automate work, surface insight and keep your pipeline moving.

children.title: Intelligent CRM Systems
children.headline: Intelligent CRM Systems That Support How You Actually Sell
children.description: We design CRM structures, objects, dashboards and processes so your teams get clarity instead of clutter and leaders see live, accurate revenue data.

children.title: Marketing Automation Platforms
children.headline: Marketing Automation Platforms Connected End-to-End
children.description: We implement and integrate marketing automation tools with Salesforce and HubSpot so journeys, scoring and campaigns are tightly connected to sales outcomes and reporting.

children.title: Systems Integration & APIs
children.headline: Your Entire Stack, Finally Working as One
children.description: We connect CRM, ERP, marketing platforms and custom applications using REST APIs, webhooks, Twilio, SendGrid, Google Maps and more so data flows cleanly end to end.

children.title: AI Engineering
children.headline: AI Engineering Embedded in Your Products and Processes
children.description: We build AI-powered features and workflows using Gemini, OpenAI, Claude and Grok, integrating them directly into your apps, portals and CRM so intelligence shows up where people work.

nodes.title: Revenue & Lead Generation
nodes.headline: Revenue & Lead Generation — One System from Click to Customer
nodes.description: We design and operate demand programs, funnels and tracking so every qualified lead is captured, worked and measured from first touch to closed deal.
nodes.call_to_action: Build your revenue and lead engine

children.title: Demand Generation
children.headline: Demand Generation That Fills Pipeline Consistently
children.description: We orchestrate inbound and outbound programs across search, social, email and AI-driven campaigns to bring a steady flow of qualified opportunities into your CRM.

children.title: Inbound
children.headline: Inbound Programs That Capture High-Intent Demand
children.description: We combine Google Ads, Meta Ads, SEO, local search and LLM-enhanced content to rank, attract and convert buyers who are already looking for what you sell.

children.title: Outbound
children.headline: Outbound Campaigns That Open the Right Doors
children.description: We build targeted outbound motions using TMT lists, one-to-one messaging and sequenced email campaigns that cut through noise and book real conversations.

children.title: Revenue Engine Systems
children.headline: Revenue Engine Systems That Align Marketing and Sales
children.description: We map and implement the full lead-to-revenue journey, from acquisition and qualification to opportunity management and renewals, so teams operate from one shared funnel.

children.title: Engagement & Tracking Tools
children.headline: Engagement and Tracking That Reveal What Really Works
children.description: We implement LiveChat, call tracking and multi-touch attribution so every visit, conversation and call is tied back to campaigns and revenue.

nodes.title: AI & Automation
nodes.headline: AI & Automation That Quietly Scale Your Business
nodes.description: We design AI agents, automations and data intelligence layers that remove manual work, speed up response times and give leaders clearer insight.

children.title: AI Agents & Workflows
children.headline: AI Agents and Workflows That Support Your Teams 24/7
children.description: We build agents on Gemini, GPT, Claude and Grok that triage requests, answer questions and execute routine tasks across sales, service and operations.

children.title: AI Sales & Support Assistants
children.headline: AI Sales & Support Assistants That Handle the First Mile
children.description: We deploy AI assistants that qualify leads, answer common questions and route issues so your human teams can focus on complex, high-value interactions.
children.call_to_action: Pilot an AI assistant in your team

children.title: AI for Marketing & CRM
children.headline: AI for Marketing & CRM That Makes Every Touch Smarter
children.description: We add predictive scoring, intelligent segmentation and AI-driven nurturing into your marketing and CRM stack to prioritize the right accounts and messages.
children.call_to_action: Add AI intelligence to your CRM

children.title: Operational Automation
children.headline: Operational Automation That Frees Teams From Repetition
children.description: We identify high-volume, repeatable workflows and rebuild them using triggers, APIs and AI so work moves automatically instead of relying on spreadsheets and reminders.
children.call_to_action: Automate your top three manual processes

children.title: Data Intelligence & BI
children.headline: Data Intelligence & BI for Confident, Real-Time Decisions
children.description: We design analytics pipelines and BI models that turn scattered data into clear dashboards for executives, managers and frontline teams.

children.title: Performance Dashboards & BI Systems
children.headline: Performance Dashboards That Put the Right Numbers in Front of the Right People
children.description: We build role-specific dashboards for marketing, sales, service and leadership so everyone sees timely metrics and can drill into the details that matter.
children.call_to_action: Design your executive and team dashboards

nodes.title: Talent Recruitment & Acquisition
nodes.headline: Talent Recruitment & Acquisition for Modern Digital Teams
nodes.description: We help you hire the cloud, AI, Salesforce and growth talent needed to run the systems we build and sustain your transformation.

children.title: Technical Talent Recruitment
children.headline: Technical Talent Recruitment for Cloud, AI and Salesforce
children.description: We source and vet engineers and specialists who understand modern stacks, from Google Cloud and AWS to Salesforce, Vue and data platforms.
children.call_to_action: Start a search for technical talent

children.title: Marketing & Growth Talent Recruitment
children.headline: Marketing & Growth Talent That Know How to Drive Pipeline
children.description: We recruit performance marketers, demand generation leaders and RevOps specialists who can turn your platforms and data into revenue.

children.title: AI-Assisted Candidate Profiling
children.headline: AI-Assisted Candidate Profiling to Reduce Hiring Risk
children.description: We use structured scorecards and LLM-driven analysis to assess skills, experience and fit so you make better hiring decisions faster.

children.title: Recruitment Automations
children.headline: Recruitment Automations That Scale Your Hiring Process
children.description: We implement outreach, scoring and scheduling automations so your recruiting team can focus on human conversations instead of admin.

nodes.title: Consulting & Strategy
nodes.headline: Consulting & Strategy That Connect Vision to Systems
nodes.description: We align your business model, go-to-market and technology investments, then define a roadmap that turns strategy into working cloud, AI, CRM and marketing systems.

children.title: Digital Transformation
children.headline: Digital Transformation That Respects Where You Are Today
children.description: We assess your current stack and processes, then plan a sequence of changes that modernize your technology and teams without disrupting the business.

children.title: AI Strategy
children.headline: AI Strategy With Clear Use Cases and Guardrails
children.description: We help you identify where AI can create real value, prioritize initiatives and define governance so you can scale AI safely and effectively.

children.title: Cloud & Architecture Strategy
children.headline: Cloud & Architecture Strategy for Scalable, Connected Systems
children.description: We design target architectures and platform choices on Google Cloud, AWS and Salesforce that support your long-term growth instead of fighting it.

children.title: CRM & RevOps Strategy
children.headline: CRM & RevOps Strategy for Faster, Cleaner Revenue
children.description: We reimagine your pipeline stages, territories, SLAs and reporting so sales, marketing and success work from a shared, efficient revenue process.
children.call_to_action: Audit your CRM and RevOps setup

children.title: Growth Strategy
children.headline: Growth Strategy That Unifies Channels, Content and AI
children.description: We create an integrated plan across SEO, paid media, content, outbound, AEO and AI so every channel knows its role in hitting your revenue targets.
children.call_to_action: Align your growth channels around one plan

children.title: Technical Program Leadership
children.headline: Technical Program Leadership to Deliver Complex Change
children.description: We lead cross-functional programs that touch cloud, AI, CRM and marketing, keeping initiatives on track and tied to measurable business outcomes.
children.call_to_action: Add experienced leadership to your key programs

nodes.title: About
nodes.headline: About IntelliCloud
nodes.description: A hybrid team of cloud engineers, Salesforce experts, AI builders, marketers and strategists focused on engineering the systems that power your next phase of growth.

nodes.title: Insights
nodes.headline: Insights from the Front Lines of Cloud, AI and Revenue Engineering
nodes.description: Articles, breakdowns and case studies that share what is working right now in cloud architecture, AI adoption, CRM, marketing and digital growth.

nodes.title: Contact
nodes.headline: Let's Build Your Next Growth System
nodes.description: Connect with IntelliCloud to discuss your current state, your growth goals and which systems will move the needle fastest.
